recipe.title: Peppermint Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 1 cup chilled heavy whipping cream, divided
4 ounces bittersweet (preferably 60% cocoa) chocolate, coarsely chopped
instructions: Beat 1/2 cup cream and 1 teaspoon sugar in bowl until soft peaks form. Cover; chill. Whisk 1/2 cup cream, 2 tablespoons sugar, and milk in medium saucepan over medium-high heat; bring to boil. Remove from heat. Add chocolate; whisk until smooth. Whisk in extract. Divide chocolate among mugs. Top with cream and garnish with candy canes.
